approach.label: Approach
approach.content:
I started as a designer and worked my way up the creative ladder. I pride myself on leading by example. I don’t ask anyone on the team to do anything I haven’t done in the past. that has helped me forge strong bonds over the years


the design tenets I have carried with me along the way include:


Less is lovely
Details are delightful
research is required
collaboration is crucial
in-person, please

these ingredients generate an environment where wonderful things can grow.

brownEvent.title: Happy birthday to me!
brownEvent.content: Learned to crawl, walked, said my first word, socialized at daycare, first day of school, made a best friend, drew every day, got in trouble, got an “A”, saw “E.T.” (cried), heard Beastie Boys “Licenced to Ill” (danced), fell in love with art, started junior high, got hit by a car, became an amateur rapper, fell in love, got a broken heart, went to a funeral, started high school, drove a car, won some art awards, graduated high school, got the hell out of my parents’ house
